ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: The 'Codemeta' Project defines a 'JSON-LD' format for describing software metadata, as detailed at <https://codemeta.github.io>. This package provides core utilities to generate this metadata with a minimum of dependencies.

The 'Codemeta' Project defines a 'JSON-LD' format for describing software metadata, as detailed at <https://codemeta.github.io>. This package provides core utilities to generate this metadata with a minimum of dependencies.

name: r-codemeta
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-codemeta
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/codemeta_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/codemeta/codemeta_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2a847777515db7857a716b637f8a24bb25b0f41e8c3920de2d6acfc77cb9915d

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-desc
    - r-jsonlite >=1.6
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-desc
    - r-jsonlite >=1.6

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('codemeta')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('codemeta')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/cboettig/codemeta
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: The 'Codemeta' Project defines a 'JSON-LD' format for describing software metadata,
    as detailed at <https://codemeta.github.io>. This package provides core utilities
    to generate this metadata with a minimum of dependencies.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
